author: costin
msg: Few fixes and changes in jasper.
- added back the old code that read taglibs.xml - if jaxp fails, we'll revert to the
previous method ( required when we try to embed tomcat into an application where we can't
use jaxp ). This will probably go away as soon as more jaxp parsers are available, but
right now there is a conflict between the old code and jaxp.
- also added few more debug statements in jsp loader and make sure we forward to
- few debug statements and an alternate way to create the output. Right now it's not active,
but doPriviledged may be used if reading System properties is not permited.
A serious ( and paranoic ) security review is needed  - in 3.3 probably

author: nacho
msg: Added some functionality to get a concrete locale,
